title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions 
Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to General Practitioners) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022.

title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017
heading: 2. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on 1
text_raw:

title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017
heading: 3. The Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments
text_raw:
3. The Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments 
to General Practitioners) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 692 of 2019) (as amended 
by the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to 
General Practitioners) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 311 of 2020) 
and the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to 
General Practitioners) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 685 of 
2020)) are amended by the substitution of the following Schedules for Schedules 
1, 2 and 8: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [23] 3

title: conferred on me by section 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations shall apply to payments in respect of services rendered by a 
general practitioner to or on behalf of the Health Service Executive under and in 
accordance with the terms of the General Medical Services Scheme. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [23] 11
